name: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
description:
Rugrats in Paris: The Movie is an adventure-arcade game developed by Avalanche Software, KnowWonder and Software Creations. It came out on 01-01-2000. It was published by Mattel Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Rugrats in Paris: The Movie is available on PlayStation, Nintendo 64 and PC.
